   saṃgṛhītasya sūtrāntasya śravaṇādikarmaṇa ākhyāta uttāno vivṛtaḥ	saMgRhItasya sUtrAntasya SravaNa Adi karmaNaH AKyAtaH uttAnaH vivRtaH
   prajñaptaḥ prakāśitaḥ tāvānasya puṇyaskandhaḥ pratyāśaṃsitavyaḥ / tatkasya	prajQaptaH prakASitaH tAvAn asya puNya skanDaH pratyASaMsitavyaH / tat kasya
   hetoḥ / tathā hyasyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sarvasya	hetoH / taTA hi asyAm boDisattva BUmO sarvasya
   bodhisattvapiṭakasyoddeśanirdeśamukhāni saṃgṛhītānyākhyātāni / yāvaccāsyāṃ	boDisattva piwakasya uddeSa nirdeSa muKAni saMgRhItAni AKyAtAni / yAvat ca asyAm
   [bodhisattva]bhūmau yo dharmavinayo vistareṇa prakāśitaḥ sa	[boDisattva] BUmO yaH Darma vinayaH vistareNa prakASitaH sa
   bahulamuddeśasvādhyāya dharmānudharmapratipattitaḥ sthāsyati	bahulam uddeSa svADyAya  Darma anuDarma pratipattitaH sTAsyati
   pṛthuvṛddhivaipulyatāñca gamiṣyati na tāvatsaddharmapratirūpakāḥ pracurā	pRTu vRdDi vEpulya tAQca gamizyati na tAvat sat Darma pratirUpakAH pracurA
   bhaviṣyanti saddharmāntarddhānāya / yataśca punaḥ saddharmapratirūpakāḥ	Bavizyanti sadDarma antardDAnAya / yatas ca punar sat Darma pratirUpakAH
   pracurā bhaviṣyanti tataścāyaṃ saddharmo bhūtārthopasaṃhito tasya	pracurAH Bavizyanti tatas ca ayam sat DarmaH BUta arTa upasaMhitaH tasya
   tadantardhānaṃ bhaviṣyati /	tad antarDAnam Bavizyati /
   iti bodhisattvabhūmāvādhāre niṣṭhe yogasthāne ṣaṣṭhaṃ pratiṣṭhāpaṭalam /	iti boDisattva BUmO= ADAre nizWe yoga sTAne zazWam pratizWA pawalam /
   // samāptā ca bodhisattvabhūmiḥ //	// samAptA ca boDisattva BUmiH //
   // kṛtiriyamācāryāryāsaṅgapādānām //	// kRtiH iyam AcArI AryAsaFga pAdAnAm //
   ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāntathāgato hyavadat /	ye DarmAH hetu praBavAH hetum tezAn taTA gataH hi avadat /
   teṣāñca yo nirodha evaṃ vādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //	tezAQca yaH niroDaH evam vAdI mahA ASramaNaH //
